channel.title: Geekboards.net
channel.description:
I have been reccomended this forum/blog hosting site: Geekboards.net by many people and i think it would be a perfect site for hosting your clan forum? I am trying to help users out here by passing on information... They offer forums: SMF(Being updated),IPB,MyBB,PHPBB Blogs: Wordpress Its like smfforfree etc.. but it has much less users(your site goes faster),doesnt slow your site by putting a forum on your site, Unlimited bandwidth limit. More advantages on the main page. From another forum user:
This system is amazing!!!!! It even has daily backups unlike some other places, i hope everyone enjoys this site as much as i do. From Dave

item.title: Geekboards.net
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

Can’t argue with the price. You might as well try it.

Read full topic
